channel.title: Comments on: I was in a car accident yesterday
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: That's what she claimed. She kept coming up with stupid reasons like that. Another good one was "How could you not pay attention if you knew this happens here _all the time_?". To this I answered "this is the first time I ever seen anyone do this".
item.content:encoded: That’s what she claimed. She kept coming up with stupid reasons like that. Another good one was “How could you not pay attention if you knew this happens here _all the time_?”. To this I answered “this is the first time I ever seen anyone do this”.

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description:
"This time I was to blame because I didn’t notice she was not signaling left"
How could you see her not signaling left, if you're on her right ?
item.content:encoded:
“This time I was to blame because I didn’t notice she was not signaling left”

How could you see her not signaling left, if you’re on her right ?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: 1. Right 2. Well, I have my camera, which I used to photograph the car. Baseball bats are currently out of the question 3. The daughter, I think, knew that her mom was wrong. She couldn't say anything of course, but at least she didn't argue with me as well.
item.content:encoded:
1. Right
2. Well, I have my camera, which I used to photograph the car. Baseball bats are currently out of the question
3. The daughter, I think, knew that her mom was wrong. She couldn’t say anything of course, but at least she didn’t argue with me as well.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: 1. What a bitch! 2. For that reason I always kept a small baseball bat in my car, when I had one. 3. So now that you have the phone number you can call the daughter. Try to get her out of her shock, realizing that her mom is damn stupid.
item.content:encoded:
1. What a bitch!
2. For that reason I always kept a small baseball bat in my car, when I had one.
3. So now that you have the phone number you can call the daughter. Try to get her out of her shock, realizing that her mom is damn stupid.
